reviews.review: Игра говно одни читеры и префы но мне пойдет
The game is fine and all but there are way too many cheaters.
If you want to get ear-cancer from spinning russians it`s the perfect shit
Gra bardzo przyjemna, na ulepszeniu Prime gra się bardzo dobrze, niestety jednak bez tego ulepszenia - cheaterzy to powszechność.
Good game, but russians are annoying! Still playable doe.

Super, hlavně rusáci v teamu :)

Jogo ótimo pra se divertir casualmente ou focar no competitivo
one of the worst games ever

Oyunda özellikle ciddi bir hileden korunma sistemi getirilmesi gerekiyor. Onun haricinde herkesin bildiği 1.6'lardan buraya kadar gelmiş efsaneleşmiş oyun.Diyecek çok bir şey yok aslında oyun bilen biliyor zaten güzel bir oyun deneyimlemeyen varsa deneyebilir. Hileler arada çıldırtsa da güzel vakit geçiriliyor.
Klasyk sam w sobie. Najlepszy e-sportowy FPS.

ну просто КОНТРА в моём СЕРДЦЕ 
S1mple one love!
Very fun game that is very competitive.

Russians are in general toxic (not every Russian is toxic tho)  and it doesn't matter where in EU do you live you will end up with a Russian or maybe more than one and they won't speak english especially in lower ranks. Just to be honest I'm not intolerant, but if someone is toxic that is ruining the game.

deeinstalliert skins verkauft und aufgehört. nach 5 jahren wieder mal installiert weil nichts dolles auf dem markt ist und muss leider feststlellen das das game sich nicht verändert hat in vielen lobbys immernoch hacker drinn aber oft nicht mehr so extrem mitlerweile sind nur noch wallhacks und anti aim eher im vordergrund satt baybladende CTs oder Ts
